title: Sky Sports goes behind the scenes as Joe Lolley joins Nottingham Forest on Deadline Day
description: Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes when a Deadline Day deal is completed?
content: More than 100 transfers were finalised on Wednesday, plenty of those being revealed after the 11pm deadline had passed.But one that was finalised a little earlier in the evening saw Nottingham Forest complete a deal to sign Huddersfield midfielder Joe Lolley.Lolley signed a four-and-a-half year deal with the Sky Bet Championship side, but putting pen to paper was just one of the jobs the 25-year-old had to undertake on Wednesday.And now, thanks to Lolley's agents Key Sports, Sky Sports has been offered a glimpse into everything the new Forest star had to go through to get the deal over the line and what came nextâ€¦Click on the attached video provided to us by Key Sports for an insight into Joe Lolley's January transfer deadline day move.
